entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • First Maui app on Visual Studio fails to build. dotnet/library-packs missing #10278
  • [Android] Splash Screen BaseSize broken #10275
  • MAUI Flyout doesnt work on Android when not using Shell #10274
  • MAUI should not use private targets from iOS build tasks #10272
    Backlog
  • Switching MainPage does not work if it is a NavigationPage (similar to #2517) #10271
  • VS 17.3.4 Breaks Maui iOS build. #10270
    7.0
  • Collectionview infinite scrolling upwards #10269
    Backlog
  • Add hover property like in CSS to Button #10261
  • Cannot change Slider height with handler Android. MAUI #10259
    Backlog
  • Picker Items not showing when BindingContext is changed from null to value at runtime #10258
  • The Tick event trigger continuously on Android #10257
    Backlog
  • FlexLayout inside of an ScrollView doesn't scroll on iOS #10256
    Backlog
  • XamlC: IValueConverter with generic arguments cannot process GridLength #10255
    Backlog
  • Overlaying a StackLayout on another StackLayout does not block interaction #10252
    Backlog

Closed

  • Application OnSleep not Called in Windows #10214
  • Cant add Pin to Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps Pin collection after page is loaded using Android app #10212
  • [NetSDKE2E]With VS 17.4 preview 3 + NET7 RC2 installed, Duplicate template".NET MAUI ResourceDictionary (XAML)" display in dotnet new --list #10251
  • Empty project BLAZOR MAUI does not compile in RC1 7.0 #10254
  • Can't connect maui vs2022 app to iOS - I'll keep reporting until I get a solution. #10262
  • ListView Select Behavior is different between Windows and MacOS #8581
    7.0-rc2
  • ListView has a default Corner Radius on Windows #8580
  • Non removable forced padding on each ListViewItem #8564
    7.0-rc2
  • Get the user's geographic location information regularly in ios #10253
  • ShellApp fills the whole app on MacOS Monterey #7360
  • Collectionview selectedItemChanged event causes framework error on android #9964
  • .NET MAUI App Icon and Splash screen cannot be customized #10072
  • Setting/changing bindable property tied to xaml just before navigating back to previous page results in app crash with error System.InvalidOperationException: View is Missing Handler #10100
  • CollectionView/ListView does not scroll on MacOS Ventura #10033

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] [Splash Screen] fixes #10275 #10276
    community ✨
  • Update margin for minimal display mode #10273
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.1 to 2.5.2 #10267
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Runtime from 2.5.1 to 2.5.2 #10266
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.5.1 to 2.5.2 #10265
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.5.0 to 1.5.1 #10264
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.UI from 2.5.1 to 2.5.2 #10263
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [Windows] Updated used ListViewItem style (avoid CornerRadius etc) #10250
